alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 21 at 6:36AM AKDT until May 21 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR EASTERN ALASKA RANGE... * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Alaska Range north of Donnelly Dome. * TIMING...10 am to 10 pm Saturday. * WINDS...South 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...39 to 63. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
